returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates if the browser supports the Battery Status API.

returnValues.name: battery.level
returnValues.description: Value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the charge level.

returnValues.name: battery.charging
returnValues.description: True if the device is currently plugged in.

returnValues.name: battery.chargingTime
returnValues.description: Seconds until full charge (0 if full, Infinity if unknown).

returnValues.name: battery.dischargingTime
returnValues.description: Seconds until empty (Infinity if charging or unknown).
